messages.message:
In the base-configs, what should the default log level be?
I see some services have it at ERROR (job-service, core-platform-service)
Some have it at INFO (app-tasks, api-server)

Think we should have log level as INFO everywhere.
It should be info to me. @shaunak thoughts on this?
INFO ideally. it would depend on how detailed / noisy a service's logs are at that level for debugging - and thus the choice for default. So some services might be setting error as a result.
